channel.title: How to add items into a server
channel.description: I'm about half way done with it i made the idiot mistake of trying to do it without checking my self now i forgot where i left off. But if someone could help me with this last part i might be able to get it all done. I need to know how to give the items their image when there in inventory, how to equip them and unequip them and how to drop them and i will be done. I think I cant remember.....[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2009, 07:04:37 pm[/size][hr]forgot to add im using a pvpscape source (testscape)

item.title: How to add items into a server
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

jc22493:

Add the model. Browse through the models section.

And also after you have downloaded/made the models you should add them into your class.8.java file in your client folder.

Note: Downloading a model maker will help more i will provide one. http://uppit.com/4668C4

Read full topic
item.source: How to add items into a server
